PBox2D for JRubyArt

  • PBox2D for JRubyArt
  • mamba2928@yahoo.co.uk
  • monkstone
  • monkstoneT

PBox2D is a ruby wrapper for JBox2D, so you can use the physics engine with JRubyArt or propane (NB: original ruby-processing is no longer supported).
